meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a melon.
meanings.sent1: The melony scent of the lotion reminded me of summer.
meanings.sent2: The melony color of the dress was perfect for the garden party.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his melony hat made him look like a walking fruit salad.
meanings.sent4: The melony sky at sunset painted the horizon in shades of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The melony taste of the smoothie was refreshing on a hot day.

meanings.definition: Having the taste or smell of a melon.
meanings.sent1: The salad had a melony flavor that was both sweet and juicy.
meanings.sent2: The air was filled with the melony aroma of ripe cantaloupe.
meanings.sent3: She described the perfume as a melony paradise in a bottle.
meanings.sent4: The melony fragrance of the flowers wafted through the garden.
meanings.sent5: The melony sweetness of the dessert lingered on her taste buds.
